subject: Football
Music
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Don’t expect a blackout at this year’s Super Bowl, which will be held in daylight; the producers promise “it’s going to be different, for sure, in a lot of respects.”
snippet: Don’t expect a blackout at this year’s Super Bowl, which will be held in daylight; the producers promise “it’s going to be different, for sure, in a lot of respects.”
